title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: 1. (1) These Rules may be cited as the Nurses and Midwives (Recognition
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules may be cited as the Nurses and Midwives (Recognition 

of Professional Qualifications) (Amendment) Rules 2020. 

(2) These Rules and the Principal Rules may be cited together as the Nurses 
and Midwives (Recognition of Professional Qualifications) Rules 2018 and
text_norm: 1 (1) rule may cited nurse midwife (recognition professional qualifications) (amendment) rule 2020 (2) rule principal rule may cited together nurse midwife (recognition professional qualifications) rule 2018

conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: In these Rules “Principal Rules” means the Nurses and Midwives
text_raw:
2. 

In these Rules “Principal Rules” means the Nurses and Midwives 
(Recognition of Professional Qualifications) Rules 2018 (S.I. No. 220 of 
2018).
text_norm: 2 rule principal rule mean nurse midwife (recognition professional qualifications) rule 2018 (s.i no 220 2018)

title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: 3. Rule 12 of the Principal Rules is amended by inserting “, 8, 9 or 10”
text_raw:
3. Rule 12 of the Principal Rules is amended by inserting “, 8, 9 or 10” 

after “Rule 6”.
text_norm: 3 rule 12 principal rule amended inserting 8 9 10 rule 6

title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: 4. Rule 13 of the Principal Rules is amended by inserting “, 8, 9 or 10”
text_raw:
4. Rule 13 of the Principal Rules is amended by inserting “, 8, 9 or 10” 

after “Rule 6”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [502] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Nursing 
 and Midwifery Board of Ireland, 

16 October, 2020. 

ESSENE CASSIDY, 

 President. 

SHEILA MCCLELLAND 

 Chief Executive Officer. 

I, STEPHEN DONNELLY, Minister for Health, approve of the making of the 
foregoing Rules. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 October, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY 

 Minister for Health.

title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Rules amend the Nurses and Midwives (Recognition of Professional 
Qualifications) Rules 2018.
